title: Alpha Futures Check website
description: Alpha Futures, established in June 2024, is a futures firm offering 1 Step program types. The firm supports the Tradovate, TradingView, NinjaTrader, Quantower trading platforms. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: Trades < 2 minutes to make profits without plan prohibited.
Tick/Micro Scalping (trades < 10 ticks and < 2 mins) prohibited.
Price Limit Trading: 2% of CME price limit prohibited.
Drawdown Adjustment Rule: Withdrawing all profits after trailing balance adjusted = closure.

payout_policy.details: Standard: Every 14 days. Tiered split: 70% (1-2), 80% (3-4), 90% (5+). Max $15K. Zero: Weekly after 5 winning days ($200+ each). 90% split. Advanced: Weekly. 90% split. 50% until 30 days met.

firm_rules.expert_advisor: AI, bots, automated trading prohibited across all account types.
forbidden_strategies: Trades < 2 minutes to make profits without plan prohibited.
Tick/Micro Scalping (trades < 10 ticks and < 2 mins) prohibited.
Price Limit Trading: 2% of CME price limit prohibited.
Drawdown Adjustment Rule: Withdrawing all profits after trailing balance adjusted = closure.

seo_content:
Alpha Futures Technical Infrastructure

Alpha Futures, established in June 2024, is a futures firm offering 1 Step program types. The firm supports the Tradovate, TradingView, NinjaTrader, Quantower trading platforms. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.description: Complete technical breakdown of Alpha Futures. We analyze their futures environment and execution rules.
